tool.name: CreateWeightTableFromLDASRunoff
tool.displayname: Create Weight Table From GLDAS/NLDAS Runoff

param.name: in_LDAS_lat_variable
param.dialogReference: This is the latitude variable in the GLDAS/NLDAS NetCDF file.

param.name: in_LDAS_lon_variable
param.dialogReference: This is the longitude variable in the GLDAS/NLDAS NetCDF file.

param.name: in_rapid_connect_file
param.dialogReference: This is the river connectivity file for the RAPID simulation.

param.name: in_catchment_features
param.dialogReference: These are the catchments associated with the drainage lines used in the RAPID simulation.

param.name: stream_ID
param.dialogReference: This is the river ID in the catchments feature class.

param.name: out_weight_table
param.dialogReference: This is the weight table to output to.

param.name: out_cg_polygon_feature_class
param.displayname: Output Computational Grid Polygon Feature Class
param.dialogReference: The output feature class of ECMWF computational grid polygons within a buffered extent of the input catchment features.

param.name: out_cg_point_feature_class
param.displayname: Output Computational Grid Point Feature Class
param.dialogReference: The output feature class of ECMWF computational grid points within a buffered extent of the input catchment features. The points are the centers of the computational grid polygons.

tool.summary: This tool creates a weight table from your GLDAS or NLDAS grid and your catchment shapefile.

idCitation.resTitle: Create Weight Table From GLDAS/NLDAS Runoff

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool creates a weight table from your GLDAS or NLDAS grid and your catchment shapefile.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Created by Alan D. Snow, US Army ERDC. Based on Create Weight Table from ECMWF Runoff tool.
